alert.note: Alert for Elmore; Gooding; Owyhee; Twin Falls (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 31 at 5:18PM MDT until May 31 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM MDT FOR NORTHWESTERN TWIN FALLS...SOUTHEASTERN ELMORE...EASTERN OWYHEE AND WEST CENTRAL GOODING COUNTIES... At 518 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Twentymile Butte, or 9 miles southeast of Glenns Ferry, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Bliss around 550 PM MDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
